#id=1
#text=We were all out of food for the week , so I drove to the grocery store to pick up some supplies .
#id=2
#text=I entered the store and grabbed a grocery cart , wheeling down the aisle before me .
#id=3
#text=I started by grabbing some fresh fruits and vegetables - apples , lettuce , carrots and celery .
#id=4
#text=Then I went on the dairy aisle .
#id=5
#text=I got a gallon of milk and a dozen eggs .
#id=6
#text=Then I decided to get some lunch eat , so I got a package of ham and a package of turkey .
#id=7
#text=I would need bread , so I went to the bread aisle and got a loaf of whole wheat .
#id=8
#text=Finally , I grabbed a box of cereal - corn flakes , my favorite .
#id=9
#text=I wheeled my cart to the checkout and put my groceries on the small conveyor belt .
#text=The cashier scanned each item and then read my total : $ 40.52 .
#text=I gave her two twenty dollar bills , two quarters and two pennies .
#text=She gave me a receipt , put my food into two plastic bags .
#text=I grabbed them and was on my way .
